other_tests.findings: Vacuolated neutrophils with toxic granulations and DÃ¶hle bodies, polychromasia, anemia, and mild thrombocytopenia. No schistocytes, spherocytes, bite cells, or intracellular organisms.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen and pelvis without contrast enhancement
other_tests.findings: A 3.6-cm air-containing cavity in the posterior right hepatic lobe consistent with a hepatic abscess. No biliary dilatation, hepatic-vein or portal-vein thrombosis, ascites, or radiographic evidence of cirrhosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increase of white-cell count to 34,700 per cubic millimeter and platelet count to 136,000 per cubic millimeter. INR increased to 1.5.

other_tests.findings: 1+ protein, 4+ blood, and 2 red cells and 7 white cells per high-power field.
